title: David Zoe
body:
Really liking Zoe's design, and I've noticed a few similarities with her and David Bowie.
-The different coloured eyes.
-The affiliation with stars and space.
-Zoe and Bowie.
With his semi-recent passing, it'd be nice if this was intentional. If not, that's also really cool.

replies.body:
Oh god...."THE MEMORIES ARE COMING BACK WTF"
I just got over it too.......:|
Zoe Bowie was also David's first-born's (?) birth name. He later changed it to something else.
